javadoc: Holds options for the commands for creating new data structures.

methods.javadoc: Creates an DataApplyOptions object with the default values.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates an DataApplyOptions object with the default values.

methods.javadoc:
Copy constructor
@param dataApplyOptions the data apply options to copy
methods.name: <init>

params.name: dataApplyOptions
params.comment: the data apply options to copy

methods.name: shouldFollowData
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to create data that is referred to by the data structure.
 Default is true.

return.comment: true if structures should be created for referred to data.

methods.javadoc:
Sets whether or not to create follow on data that is referred to by the new structure.
@param followData true indicates follow on data should be created.
methods.name: setFollowData
methods.comment: Sets whether or not to create follow on data that is referred to by the new structure.

params.name: followData
params.comment: true indicates follow on data should be created.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to clear existing instructions in order to create new data.
Default is false. @return true if existing instructions should be cleared to create the new data.
methods.name: shouldClearInstructions
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to clear existing instructions in order to create 
 new data.
 Default is false.

return.comment: true if existing instructions should be cleared to create the new data.

methods.name: setClearInstructions
methods.comment: Sets whether or not to clear existing instructions in order to create new data.

params.name: clearInstructions
params.comment:
true indicates existing instructions should be cleared to create 
 the new data.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to clear existing defined data in order to create new data.
Default is false. @return true if existing defined data should be cleared to create the new data.
methods.name: shouldClearDefinedData
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to clear existing defined data in order to create 
 new data.
 Default is false.

return.comment: true if existing defined data should be cleared to create the new data.

methods.name: setClearDefinedData
methods.comment: Sets whether or not to clear existing defined data in order to create new data.

params.name: clearDefinedData
params.comment:
true indicates existing defined data should be cleared to create 
 the new data.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to create a label for the new data or for a referred to data or function.
Default is true. @return true if a label should be created for this data or for referred to structures and functions.
methods.name: shouldCreateLabel
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to create a label for the new data or for a 
 referred to data or function.
 Default is true.

return.comment:
true if a label should be created for this data or for referred to structures 
 and functions.

methods.name: setCreateLabel
methods.comment:
Sets whether or not to create labels for follow on data or a function that is referred to 
 by the current new structure.

params.name: createLabel
params.comment: true indicates a label should be created.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to disassemble and create a function that is referred to by your current structure.
Default is true. @return true if referred to functions should be created.
methods.name: shouldCreateFunction
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to disassemble and create a function that is referred
 to by your current structure.
 Default is true.

return.comment: true if referred to functions should be created.

methods.name: setCreateFunction
methods.comment:
Sets whether or not to disassemble and create a function that is referred to 
 by the current new structure.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to create bookmarks indicating any problems that occurred while creating the current structure or information associated with it.
Default is true. @return true if error bookmarks should be created.
methods.name: shouldCreateBookmarks
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to create bookmarks indicating any problems that
 occurred while creating the current structure or information associated with it.
 Default is true.

return.comment: true if error bookmarks should be created.

methods.name: setCreateBookmarks
methods.comment:
Sets whether or not to create bookmarks for problems encountered while trying to create
 an new structure or information associated with it.

params.name: createBookmarks
params.comment: true indicates error bookmarks should be created.

methods.javadoc:
An option indicating whether or not to create comments indicating any problems that occurred while creating the data or information associated with it.
Default is true. @return true if error comments should be created.
methods.name: shouldCreateComments
methods.comment:
An option indicating whether or not to create comments indicating any problems that
 occurred while creating the data or information associated with it.
 Default is true.

return.comment: true if error comments should be created.

methods.name: setCreateComments
methods.comment:
Sets whether or not to create comments for problems encountered while trying to create
 a new structure or information associated with it.

params.name: createComments
params.comment: true indicates comments for the data should be created.

name: DataApplyOptions
comment: Holds options for the commands for creating new data structures.
